user.title: Set up BlueBOLT
user.description: Connect your BlueBOLT-enabled device. You can find the MAC address on the BlueBOLT-CV2 card label or in the device's web interface.

data_description.host: Local IP address of your device (e.g., 192.168.0.162)
data_description.mac: Enter the 12-character MAC address. Find this on the CV2 card label or web interface under 'Ethernet Address'.
data_description.name: Give your device a friendly name like 'AV UPS'. Leave blank to use the IP address.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to device. Check IP and MAC addresses.
